prompts: Create a colorful bug-type Pokemon with large wings and a gentle demeanor.
Imagine a mystical Pokemon that can blend into forest environments and has a soothing presence.
Design a Pokemon that thrives in grasslands, adorned with vibrant patterns on its wings.
Show me a creature resembling a butterfly that can emit calming pheromones to soothe others.
Generate a Pokemon that uses its vibrant colors to attract mates and intimidate foes.
Give me a bug-type Pokemon that embodies the beauty of nature and has a playful personality.
Make a whimsical Pokemon with a unique wing design that can camouflage in its surroundings.

distinctive_features: Bright red eye spots on wings
